    • Method Detail

      • getStartOffset

        public long getStartOffset(opennlp.tools.util.Span span)
        Start character offset of the last token in the given Span. Note that OpenNLP's chunker and NER return token offsets between tokens, so a chunk marked (1,3) covers the document content from the beginning of token 1 to the end of token 2. Watch out for -1 (error code) output.
        Parameters:
        i -
        Returns:
        the GATE-style start offset in characters

      • getEndOffset

        public long getEndOffset(opennlp.tools.util.Span span)
        End character offset of the last token in the given Span. Note that OpenNLP's chunker and NER return token offsets between tokens, so a chunk marked (1,3) covers the document content from the beginning of token 1 to the end of token 2. This method does the subtraction and range-checking for you, but watch out for -1 (error code) output.
        Parameters:
        i -
        Returns:
        the GATE-style end offset in characters
